MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G84 postcode area of Helensburgh. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm due to a fault on our underground cable network located outside 5 James street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:59pm on Monday, 29 March 2021
